sentences.sContent: Matter, energy and dark energy all produce curvature in space-time, however.
sentences.sContent_eng: Matter, energy and dark energy all produce curvature in space-time, however.
sentences.sCn: 而事实上，物质、能量和暗能量在时空中都会产生弯曲。

sentences.sContent: The hyperbolic surface, which has so-called negative curvature because its surface curves up and down at the same time, like a saddle, just might represent the shape of the universe.
sentences.sContent_eng: The hyperbolic surface, which has so-called negative curvature because its surface curves up and down at the same time, like a saddle, just might represent the shape of the universe.
sentences.sCn: 双曲表面，即通常所称的负曲率，因为它的表面曲线同时有的向上和有的向下，像一个马鞍，也许这样就可以代表宇宙的形状。

sentences.sContent: Then, with a few assumptions about the curvature and contents of the universe, they can reconstruct the positions of those objects from redshifts.
sentences.sContent_eng: Then, with a few assumptions about the curvature and contents of the universe, they can reconstruct the positions of those objects from redshifts.
sentences.sCn: 然后，通过一些关于宇宙曲率和内容的假设，科学家们能够重建这些物体的位置。

words.tran: 曲线；弯曲；曲线球；曲线图表

trans.tranOther: the state of being curved, or the degree to which something is curved
